message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about the formation of diamonds. Diamonds are formed deep within the Earth's mantle under high pressure and temperature conditions. Option (C) is correct because pressure is a key factor in the formation of diamonds. Option (A) is unrelated to the formation of diamonds.
